description: This file defines a layout component for a Qwik-based web application, including request handling for caching, a server data loader, and rendering of header, footer, and slot for nested content.

methods.name: onGet
methods.description: Handles GET requests with cache control headers to optimize performance and reduce hosting costs.

methods.name: useServerTimeLoader
methods.description: Loads the current server time as ISO string for use in the component.
